subject: Families and Family Life
Basketball
lead_paragraph: While Taj McWilliams-Franklin, at 39 the oldest player in the W.N.B.A., travels for basketball, her husband, Reggie Franklin, cares for her youngest daughter, Maia.
snippet: While Taj McWilliams-Franklin, at 39 the oldest player in the W.N.B.A., travels for basketball, her husband, Reggie Franklin, cares for her youngest daughter, Maia.
